title: Indian-origin man questioned in Chicago; governor says ‘because of his skin color’
description: An Indian-origin US citizen, working for Illinois DOT, was questioned by masked federal agents about his immigration status and New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani. Governor Pritzker condemned the incident as potential racial profiling. The Department of Homeland Security denied the agents were from ICE or CBP, but the event caused local alarm and school lockdowns.

title: Pune man strangles wife, burns body in iron box; read crime novels before murder
description: A Pune businessman, inspired by crime fiction, meticulously planned and executed his wife's murder after suspecting an affair. He strangled her, cremated the body in a custom iron box, and scattered the ashes. Inconsistencies in his statements and call records ultimately led to his arrest, unraveling his chilling plot.

description: The border conflict between the two countries erupted following a Pakistani airstrike on Kabul. Afghanistan strongly responded to the attack following which the conflict escalated.

description: New England Patriots star Stefon Diggs faces paternity claims from Aileen Lopera, with a test confirming him as the father, while also expecting a child with Cardi B. Amidst this, Diggs shared a cryptic social media quote about fate. DJ Akademiks also alleged Diggs fathered a child with K’yanna Barber.

title: Going beyond the Earth and to the moon

Neighbours alerted by the commotion transported the victim to the hospital, where he was declared dead on arrival.

Young Indians increasingly using credit for upskilling & career advancement, finds survey
description: A new wave of financial behaviour is emerging among young Indians as credit transforms from a sign of deficit to a tool for self-investment. According to an mPokket Financial Services survey, over 63% of respondents said credit improved their finances, with many using it for education, career growth, and upskilling—reflecting a shift toward purpose-driven borrowing in India’s evolving job market.

title: Klay Thompson apologises to Megan Thee Stallion after airport pickup mishap
description: Dallas Mavericks star Klay Thompson went viral for his heartfelt apology and remorse after arriving late to pick up girlfriend Megan Thee Stallion from the airport. He presented her with flowers, expressing genuine regret, which fans found "adorably human." The couple's authentic connection continues to charm audiences as they both thrive in their careers.

title: Patrick Mahomes speechless as Brittany joins star-studded NWSL board
description: Brittany Mahomes has joined a star-studded advisory board for the NWSL, focusing on marketing, branding, and player initiatives starting in 2026. This appointment signifies a major cultural shift for the Kansas City Current and women's sports. Patrick Mahomes silently supported the announcement, highlighting Kansas City's growing influence in both men's and women's professional sports.

title: Connor McDavid’s wife Lauren Kyle drops ‘Oilers Collection 03’ racing-inspired line
description: Lauren Kyle, founder of Sports Club Atelier and wife of Connor McDavid, has unveiled "Oilers Collection 03," a new capsule inspired by classic motorsport style. The collection blends the Oilers' iconic colors with high-end streetwear and automotive aesthetics, drawing from vintage racing suits and team heritage. Kyle shared a preview on Instagram, highlighting the performance-driven fashion.

title: Canada’s $1.2 bn plan to woo H-1B visa holders; reveals new immigration plan
description: Canada is rolling out a new immigration strategy, aiming to attract over 1,000 top researchers with a $1.2 billion investment. The nation plans to welcome 380,000 permanent residents annually from 2026-2028.  An accelerated pathway for H-1B visa holders is also in the works, potentially drawing skilled professionals from the US.

title: 'Condemn what happened': Nadigar Sangam reacts to YouTuber's question on Gouri G. Kishan
description: The South Indian Artists' Association strongly condemns a YouTuber's indecent question posed to actress Gouri G. Kishan. Association president Nassar highlighted the film industry's respect for women and the need to protect their dignity. He called for strict action against individuals misusing social media platforms and posing as journalists. Measures will be taken to prevent such incidents in the future.

title: Marshawn Kneeland’s ‘goodbye’ text hours before death highlights NFL crisis
description: Marshawn Kneeland’s death at 24 has forced the NFL to confront a serious mental health crisis. Police confirmed the Dallas Cowboys defensive end died by an apparent self-inflicted gunshot wound after alarming messages to family. Coaches, teammates, and fans are grieving as dispatch audio reveals the severity of his final hours. Full details inside.

title: ‘Not about compensation’: Twitter founder defends Musk’s $1Tn pay; quotes Tesla’s old post
description: Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey has publicly supported Tesla CEO Elon Musk's proposed $1 trillion pay package. Dorsey stated the compensation is about ensuring a principled engineering approach for the company's future. This support comes as Tesla shareholders prepare to vote on the package at their annual general meeting today, November 6.
